# lastModifiedDate

**Instance Property**

The date that the calendar item was last modified.

## Declaration

```swift
var lastModifiedDate: Date? { get }
```

## Accessing Calendar Item Properties

- **calendar**: The calendar for the calendar item.
- **title**: The title for the calendar item.
- **location**: The location associated with the calendar item.
- **creationDate**: The date that this calendar item was created.
- **timeZone**: The time zone for the calendar item.
- **url**: The URL for the calendar item.
